# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="02eb4-102">Tilføjelse af flag og påmindelser i Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="02eb4-103">Angive eller redigere en påmindelse for en hændelse:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-104">Gå til [kalender](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-105">Vælg den hændelse, du vil påmindes om og derefter på pilene i øverste højre hjørne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-106">for at udvide den.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-107">Vælg et tidspunkt for påmindelse **Påmind mig**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="02eb4-108">Outlook.com gemmer automatisk dine ændringer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="02eb4-109">For at minde dig selv for at følge op på en meddelelse, kan du tilføje et opfølgningsflag:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-110">Gå til [E-mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-111">Placer markøren over meddelelsen for at se indstillingen flag på meddelelseslisten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-112">Vælg flagikonet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-113">til at markere meddelelsen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="02eb4-114">Marker afkrydsningsfeltet nederst til venstre på siden for at gå til opgaver for at se alle dine markerede meddelelser.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="02eb4-115">For at få mere for at vide ved at læse [Flag eller PIN-kode en meddelelse i Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="02eb4-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
